cdr6pi.question: The engine Cowl Anti-Ice valve is located UPSTREAM of the Engine Bleed Air Valve.

isx62.question: If the cowl anti-ice valve fails to move to the position indicated by the ENG ANTI-ICE switch, the COWL VALVE OPEN light remains illuminated bright blue and an amber TAI indication immediately illuminates on the CDS.

j3hj8k.question: Positioning ENG ANTI-ICE switch to on has what effect?

options.text: Stall warning logic adjusts stick shaker and minimum maneuver speed bars on airspeed indicator.
Adjusted stall warning logic for stick shaker, minimum maneuver speed bars on airspeed indicator, and automatically adjusted FMC displayed VREF; remain for rest of flight.

Adjusted stall warning logic for stick shaker, minimum maneuver speed bars on airspeed indicator, and automatically adjusted FMC displayed VREF; return to normal when engine anti-ice is positioned to OFF.
FMC displayed VREF is adjusted automatically.

uomna.question: When operating on standby power only the Captain's pitot probe is still heated - if the Captain's pitot probe heating fails in this condition, there is no CAPT PITOT alert given.

7un63.question: On the ground and in flight, the wing anti-ice valves close if the forward thrust levers are advanced above the takeoff warning setting.

4xs1r.question: The rain removal system for the forward windows comprises of the following:

options.text: Windshield wipers, hydroscopic rain repellent coating.
Windshield wipers, heated windows, hydroscopic rain repellent coating.

69dd4.question: What do the green ON lights indicate above the Window heat switches?

options.text: Illuminated means window heat needs to be switched on for that window, extinguished means heat now being applied to that window.
Extinguished means heat still being applied to window but not yet at correct operating temperature, illuminated means window at correct temperature.
Illuminated means heat being applied to windows, extinguished means windows at correct temperature
Illuminated means the window Overheat system has activated.
